Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Strong expression in the bone marrow and testis. Expressed in the ovarian stroma and the theca layer of the ovarian follicles. Not expressed in the granulosa layer of the ovarian follicles.
Sequence Information.Developmental stage: Detected in the theca and granulosa layers of the ovarian follicle in the white follicle (WF), F1, F3, F5, and postovulatory follicle stages. Induction
